title: Ludovic: visiting Grandpa
creator_credit: Co Hoedeman, Jean-Jacques Leduc and National Film Board of Canada
brief_description: Ludovic spends the afternoon with Grandpa on the farm, tending the animals and the garden. Ludovic and his grandfather both miss grandma very much. Although she’s gone, her magic is still around. Direction, animation, script and camera work by Co Hoedeman.
